a.title: Follow this site and get back to it easily from your sites page.

div.p: Choose from the most innovative schools and programs in the state.
Find your child's grades online and more. HAC contains real-time data—as soon as a teacher enters a grade, attendance, etc, it's there for you.

div.p: Find your grades online and more. HAC contains real-time data—as soon as a teacher enters a grade, attendance, etc, it's there for you.
Use Word, Powerpoint, Outlook email, Excel and more for free on the Web. Save all your files in the cloud to access from anywhere.

div.p: Love Tacoma. Sign up to serve kids in our city. Dedicated volunteers can mentor and inspire students and provide new opportunities beyond what schools can.

div.p: This is the road map that drives our work to ensure the success of Every Student. Every Day.

h4.a: Departments & Programs From Head Start to Athletics, Human Resources to Libraries and much more...

div.p: Qualified students are automatically enrolled in advanced courses that prepare them for college and beyond.
Watch video stories from Tacoma's best. Overcoming obstacles so students grow to become empowered, self-directed learners...
Stay tuned for frequent updates and important information about school design and construction projects

h3.a: Get the scoop on our construction projects »

div.p: We are committed to learning environments that fit every student.
A 14.8% improvement in three years and we’re not letting up.
Volunteers and community partners play a huge role in student success.
Our emphasis on early learning sets a foundation for achievement.

p.br: To measure progress toward meeting the School Board’s strategic goals, we use a set of benchmarks that let parents and community members track our progress. It’s like a report card for each school and the whole district.
